name: criipto-signatures-sdk
description: A SDK repository for Criipto Signatures

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:nodejs && npm run test:integration:dotnet && npm run test:integration:python
scripts.test:integration:nodejs: cd packages/nodejs && npm run test:integration && cd ../..
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:nodejs && npm run test:unit:dotnet
scripts.test:unit:nodejs: cd packages/nodejs && npm run test:unit && cd ../..
scripts.format:dotnet: cd packages/dotnet && dotnet format style . && dotnet format analyzers . && dotnet csharpier . && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run build:nodejs && npm run build:dotnet
scripts.build:nodejs: cd packages/nodejs && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build:dotnet: npm run format:dotnet && cd packages/dotnet && dotnet build Criipto.Signatures.sln && cd ../..
